lyrics:
Around The World LyricsAround the world I’ve searched for you;
I traveled on when hope was gone
To keep a rendezvous
I knew somewhere, sometime, somehow
You’d look at me and I would see
The smile you’re smil-ing now
It might have been in country down
Or in new York, or gay Paree
Or even London town
No more will I go all around the world
For I have found my world in youEmbed
